publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3555 Hugh Henry: Fred Goodwin’s Pension—That the Parliament believes that the pension payment to Sir Fred Goodwin is wrong and that failure should not be rewarded and further believes that steps should be taken to have this pension stopped and that any payment to Sir Fred Goodwin should be brought into line with the compensation available to ordinary employees at the Royal Bank of Scotland who face unemployment.

S3M-3555 Hugh Henry: Fred Goodwin’s Pension—That the Parliament believes that the pension payment to Sir Fred Goodwin is wrong and that failure should not be rewarded and further believes that steps should be taken to have this pension stopped and that any payment to Sir Fred Goodwin should be brought into line with the compensation available to ordinary employees at the Royal Bank of Scotland who face unemployment. Supported by: Des McNulty*, Margaret Curran*, Patricia Ferguson*, Paul Martin*, Bill Butler*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3555 Fred Goodwin’s Pension (lodged on 26 February 2009) Angela Constance*, David Whitton*, Margaret Smith*, George Foulkes*, Karen Gillon*, Karen Whitefield*, Sandra White*
S3M-3555 Fred Goodwin’s Pension (lodged on 26 February 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-3555 Fred Goodwin’s Pension (lodged on 26 February 2009) Peter Peacock*
S3M-3555 Fred Goodwin’s Pension (lodged on 26 February 2009) Cathy Peattie*
